meta.review_title: Committing suicide is a better option than dealing with them
meta.review_content: What can I say that hasn't been said. Evil, corrupt, deceitful. "Customer service", the greatest ironic name ever invented. And can we please kill their bot Tobi, who drives me to both homicide and suicide. Obviously I'm paying WAY more for WAY less. Pathetic, I have lost the will to live just having to deal with them, and obviously NOTHING is resolved.
